Task_Title: Check bobbin carriage shock absorber
Steps_Text:
1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Task_Title: Lubricate the bobbin carriage centering bearing
Steps_Text: Use the hand grease gun and lubricate the bearing with Mobil B2

Task_Title: Check the bobbin carriage movement speed
Steps_Text:
Move the carriage in and out and adjust if required using the flow
regulator located on the cylinder both ends

Task_Title: Lubricate the bobbin carriage liner bearing
Steps_Text: Use the hand grease gun and lubricate the bearing with Mobil B2

Task_Title: Change the myler gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for myler motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain
3- Put the cover back

Task_Title: Change the let off gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Change the angle motor gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Change the windup motor gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Check the magnet cylinders
Steps_Text:
1- Check on the movement of the magnets up and down
2- Adjust the speed of both or one of them if required

Task_Title: Lubricate the feeding guide screw
Steps_Text: Put enough amount of grease OMEGA 77 on the screw

Task_Title: Check the magnet tray roller
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

Task_Title: Check the feeding movement speed
Steps_Text:
Move the feeding magnet forward and backward and adjust if
required using the flow  regulator located on the cylinder both ends

Task_Title: Check feeding cylinder shock absorber
Steps_Text:
1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Task_Title: Check the bushes of the feeding screw
Steps_Text:
1- Move the feeding cylinder and check the bushes conditions
2- Replace the bushes in case if they are loose

Task_Title: Lubricate the metal chain for feeding screw motor
Warning_Text: Change the machine into manual mode
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the chain cover
2- Put enough amount of grease on the chain
3- Put the cover back

Task_Title: Change the feeding screw motor gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Check the blades hydraulic cylinders
Steps_Text:
1- Check the condition of the fixation hinges of the hydraulic
cylinder
2- Replace the hinge if it's loose
3- Replace the cylinder for irregular movement

Task_Title: Check the condition of the belt tray and its cylinder
Steps_Text:
1- Move the cylinder up and down and check the stoppage
positions of the tray
2- Adjust the tray position using the fixation pallet of the
cylinder
3- Check the belt for wear and replace if required

Task_Title: Check the smooth movement of the jumping tray
Steps_Text:
1- Check the movement of all trays and check the supply air hose if
required
2- Adjust all trays on the same level with the fixed tray and blade
edge

Task_Title: Check safety guard for blades
Steps_Text:
1- Check the fixation of the transparent covers
2- Check the limit switch actuation pallet

Task_Title: Check the conditions of the splicing unit
Steps_Text:
1- Check the condition of the splicing gears and replace if required
2- Check the clearance of splicing gears and adjust if required
3- Check splice guide cylinder efficiency and replace if required

Task_Title: Check the V belt condition of the supply belt
Warning_Text: Put the machine in manual mode
Steps_Text:
Remove the cover of the belt and check for belt condition for
scratches or wear and replace if required

Task_Title: Check the V belt condition of the discharge belt
Warning_Text: Put the machine in manual mode
Steps_Text:
Remove the cover of the belt and check for belt condition for
scratches or wear and replace if required

Task_Title: Check strip timing belt
Warning_Text: Put the machine in manual mode
Steps_Text:
Remove the cover of the belt and check for belt condition for
scratches or wear and replace if required

Task_Title: Check the condition of the air turbine
Steps_Text:
Open the turbine and check its rotating fins for wear and
replace if required

Task_Title: Check the strip tray roller
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

Task_Title: Lubrication of caution bearing
Steps_Text: Use the hand grease gun and lubricate the bearing with Mobil B2

Task_Title: Check the free movement of the strip centering device
Steps_Text:
Check the movement of the centering device for damaged
bearings or guides

Task_Title: Check the wind up tray roller
Steps_Text:
Check the condition of the rollers and its bearings and replace
if required

Task_Title: Change the bobbin gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Change the rotating tray gearbox oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug and dump the used oil
2- Refill the gearbox with new oil Mobil 632

Task_Title: Clean the rotating tray area
Steps_Text:
Remove any dirt in the rotating tray gear area to ensure smooth
operation

Task_Title: Check bobbin rotating tray shock absorber
Steps_Text:
1- Manually check the operation of the shock absorber.
2- if its too smooth replace the oil and if its too hard check the spring and rod
alignment

Task_Title: General air leakage check
Steps_Text:
1- Check the supply air hoses for leakage
2- Check the oil level in the air lubricator

Task_Title: Check hydraulic oil level
Steps_Text: Check the level and refill if required with Mobil DTE 26

Task_Title: Change the hydraulic oil
Steps_Text:
1- Remove the drain plug at the bottom of the tank
2- Refill the tank with oil Mobil DTE 26

Task_Title: Lubricate all machine bearing housing
Steps_Text:
Use the hand grease gun to lubricate the bearing housing till the
new grease appears around the bearing

Task_Title: General machine cleaning with air
Steps_Text:
1- Clean beneath the belt tray
2- Clean beneath the feeding magnet and tray
3- Clean the strip area
